footer_prod_count.label: Products Count of Footer
footer_prod_count.comment: The number of displayed product in Footer.

alt_image_column.label: Select Alternative Image By Column (Default)
alt_image_column.comment: Which column of the product image gallery will mark alternative images of your products.

alt_image_column_value.label: Alternative Image Column Value (Default)
alt_image_column_value.comment: Specify the value which will mark alternative images of your products. E.g.: if Select Alt. Image By Column is set to "Sort Order", specify the number which will mark (in "Sort Order" column of the product image gallery) alternative images, for example: "2".

prod_img_size_heading.label: Product Image Size on Category Page

banner_style.label: Type (Default)
banner_style.comment: You can set this value as default in here and can set individually in 'Catalog / Manage Categories'.

img_width.label: Main Image Width
img_width.comment: If width is not specified, default image width will be used.

img_height.label: Main Image Height
img_height.comment:
If Image Rate is specified, this value will be ignored and actual height will be calcuated based on Main Image Width and Image Rate.
If width is not specified, default width and height will be used.

from_category.label: Show Tabs by Settings from Parent Categories

custom_css.label: Load Custom CSS
custom_css.comment: Enable this option to load "custom.css" file is located in skin/frontend/smartwave/granada/css directory.

custom_style.label: Custom Style
custom_style.comment:
Type in your custom styles , e.g.:
.page { padding: 0; margin: 0; }
.main { font-size: 14px; font-weight:400; }

import_blocks.label: Static Blocks
import_blocks.comment: Click this button to create all static blocks provided with granada theme.

overwrite_blocks.label: Overwrite Existing Blocks
overwrite_blocks.comment: If the identifiers of the static blocks are already exist, you can set to "Yes" then save the configuration, then click the "Import Static Blocks" button.

import_pages.label: CMS Pages
import_pages.comment: Click this button to create all CMS pages provided with granada theme.

overwrite_pages.label: Overwrite Existing Pages
overwrite_pages.comment: If the identifiers of the cms pages are already exist, you can set to "Yes" then save the configuration, then click the "Import CMS Pages" button.

primary_font_family_group.label: Font Family
primary_font_family_group.comment: Select predefined font stack, Google Fonts or type in your custom font stack.

primary_font_family_custom.label: Custom
primary_font_family_custom.comment:
Type in your custom font stack, e.g.:
Arial, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, sans-serif Important: Do not add trailing semicolon.

primary_font_family.label: Font Family - Google Fonts
primary_font_family.comment: Font preview is available on Google Web Fonts

primary_char_latin.label: Character Set: Latin
primary_char_latin.comment: Only selected fonts support extended character sets. For a complete list of available fonts and font subsets please refer to Google Web Fonts.

primary_char_latin_ext.label: Character Set: Latin Extended
primary_char_latin_ext.comment: Only selected fonts support extended character sets. For a complete list of available fonts and font subsets please refer to Google Web Fonts.

heading_font_family_group.label: Font Family
heading_font_family_group.comment: Select predefined font stack, Google Fonts or type in your custom font stack.

heading_font_family_custom.label: Custom
heading_font_family_custom.comment:
Type in your custom font stack, e.g.:
Arial, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, sans-serif Important: Do not add trailing semicolon.

heading_font_family.label: Font Family - Google Fonts
heading_font_family.comment: Font preview is available on Google Web Fonts

heading_char_latin.label: Character Set: Latin
heading_char_latin.comment: Only selected fonts support extended character sets. For a complete list of available fonts and font subsets please refer to Google Web Fonts.

heading_char_latin_ext.label: Character Set: Latin Extended
heading_char_latin_ext.comment: Only selected fonts support extended character sets. For a complete list of available fonts and font subsets please refer to Google Web Fonts.

sub_font_family_group.label: Font Family
sub_font_family_group.comment: Select predefined font stack, Google Fonts or type in your custom font stack.

sub_font_family_custom.comment:
Type in your custom font stack, e.g.:
Arial, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, sans-serif Important: Do not add trailing semicolon.

sub_font_family.label: Font Family - Google Fonts
sub_font_family.comment: Font preview is available on Google Web Fonts

sub_char_latin.label: Character Set: Latin
sub_char_latin.comment: Only selected fonts support extended character sets. For a complete list of available fonts and font subsets please refer to Google Web Fonts.

sub_char_latin_ext.label: Character Set: Latin Extended
sub_char_latin_ext.comment: Only selected fonts support extended character sets. For a complete list of available fonts and font subsets please refer to Google Web Fonts.

secondary_font_family_group.label: Font Family
secondary_font_family_group.comment: Select predefined font stack, Google Fonts or type in your custom font stack.

secondary_font_family_custom.label: Custom
secondary_font_family_custom.comment:
Type in your custom font stack, e.g.:
Arial, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, sans-serif Important: Do not add trailing semicolon.

secondary_char_latin.comment: Only selected fonts support extended character sets. For a complete list of available fonts and font subsets please refer to Google Web Fonts.

secondary_char_latin_ext.comment: Only selected fonts support extended character sets. For a complete list of available fonts and font subsets please refer to Google Web Fonts.

c_page_bg.label: Background Color
c_page_bg.comment: In boxed version, this is the color of out side of main wrapper.

body_bg_img.label: Background Image
body_bg_img.comment: In boxed version, this is the background image of out side of main wrapper.

c_navigation_bg.label: Background Color
c_navigation_bg.comment: It is effective in only Header Type 1

s_navigation_bd.label: Used Border
s_navigation_bd.comment: It is effective in only Header Type 1

c_navigation_bd.label: Border Color
c_navigation_bd.comment: It is effective in only Header Type 1

c_add_cart_hv_bg.label: 'Add To Cart' Button Hover Background Color

c_add_cart_hv_txt.label: 'Add To Cart' Button Hover Text Color

c_cat_link_hv_bg.label: Other Buttons Hover Background Color
c_cat_link_hv_bg.comment: This is for only category grid page.

c_cat_link_hv_txt.label: Other Buttons Hover Text Color
c_cat_link_hv_txt.comment: This is for only category grid page.

c_cat_link_bg.label: Other Buttons Background Color
c_cat_link_bg.comment: This is for only category grid page.

c_cat_link_txt.label: Other Buttons Text Color
c_cat_link_txt.comment: This is for only category grid page.
